title: The High School Girl Trio's Secret Café (Part 1)

infobox.Title:: The High School Girl Trio's Secret Café
infobox.Japanese title:: JKトリオ秘密のカフェ  (Jēkē torio himitsu no kafe)
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Kogoro Mouri  Ran Mouri  Sonoko Suzuki  Masumi Sera  Shinichi Kudo  Soshi Okita  Yoko Okino  Ai Haibara

Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Wakana Yamazaki as Ran Mouri  Rikiya Koyama as Kogoro Mouri  Kappei Yamaguchi as Shinichi Kudo  Naoko Matsui as Sonoko Suzuki  Wataru Takagi as Wataru Takagi  Chafurin as Juzo Megure  Noriko Hidaka as Masumi Sera  Kōji Yusa as Soshi Okita  Takashi Kondo as Daiki Saraie  Shunsuke Sakuya as Toshinori Motosu (Toshinori Hasunuma)  Yoshiko Kamei as Tamao Hasunuma  Aya Endo as Isuzu Naomura

sections.Part 1: Kogoro and Conan notices that Ran has behave strangely. Kogoro suspects that Shinichi is seducing Ran, and while Conan knows that it can't be the case, they decide to follow her. They see Ran, Sonoko and Masumi who are having some lunch at Café Rice Flower, all the while marvelling at the pictures of a travel guide about a trip to Kyoto.
sections.Part 2: Sera presents her deduction to everyone and when she doesn't point out the culprit, it was backed up by Conan.
sections.People:
- Victim (bludgeoned)
- 33 years old
- Waiter
- 38 years old
- Customer
- Birth name: Toshinori Hasunuma
- 27 years old
- Waitress
- 40 years old
- Café manager
sections.Resolution: It turns out that the secret trip to Kyoto is a field trip with the school.
sections.Manga to anime changes:
- The Logo of Beika Bookstore doesn't have any white border in the manga but it does in the anime.
- The part where Kogoro and Conan follow Ran in Beika is much shorter in the manga probably because of timing issues.
- There is no appearance in the manga of the Cheetah Delivery Service.
- In the manga, there is no flashback of the corpse of Shido Nukitani and Soshi Okita looking above it.
